The lion was very excited to go to the city. He had never been there before and he had heard so many wonderful things about it. He was especially excited to see all of the different animals that lived there.

When he arrived, he was amazed at how big and bustling the city was. He saw all sorts of animals walking and running around, and he even saw some humans! He walked around for a while, taking everything in.

One day, he even sees a human! He is curious about this strange creature and follows it around for a while. He soon learns that humans are actually quite interesting and he enjoys watching them.
